sentences.cn: 空军少将安德鲁∙伯恩斯

sentences.en: He is the past vice - president.
His vice president also had to resign in disgrace.
sentences.cn: 他的副总统也被迫不光彩地辞去职务。

sentences.en: I think that the vice president was in the loop.
sentences.cn: 我认为副总统是局内人。

sentences.en: Mr. Black has been appointed leader vice Mr. Brown.
sentences.cn: 布莱克先生取代布朗先生被任命为队长.

sentences.en: plain-clothes detectives from the vice squad
sentences.cn: 取缔性或毒品犯罪行动队的便衣侦探

sentences.en: She's been downgraded from principal to vice-principal.
sentences.cn: 她已从校长降职为副校长。

sentences.en: the fight against vice on the streets
The police have smashed a vice ring (= a group of criminals involved in vice ) in Chicago.
sentences.cn: 警方捣毁了芝加哥的一个犯罪团伙。

sentences.en: The vice - president is trying to usurp the president's authority.
sentences.cn: 副总统想要夺取总统的权力.

sentences.en: The vice-president must now take on the mantle of supreme power.
sentences.cn: 副总统现在必须承担起最高权力的重任。

sentences.en: The vice-president seems to have a good working relationship with the president.
sentences.cn: 副总统似乎与总统有着良好的工作关系。
他们的副总裁是他们的代言人。

sentences.en: Tim Munton becomes the new vice-captain.
sentences.cn: 蒂姆·芒顿成为新的副队长。

sentences.en: We gossip about them and vice versa ( = they gossip about us ).
sentences.cn: 我们谈论他们,他们也谈论我们.

sentences.en: When the President is ill, his duties devolve on the Vice - President.
sentences.cn: 总统生病时, 其职责由副总统代理.

words.tran_cn: 恶习；缺点；[机]老虎钳；卖淫

phrases.tran_cn: 副处长；副主任；副院长；副会长
反之亦然，反过来也一样

trans.tran_en: serving in the place of or as a deputy for

trans.tran_cn: 罪行，恶行，邪恶，缺点，老虎钳

trans.tran_en: to grip (something) with or as if with a vice
